markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Deinonychus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=118)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Deinonychuses are wily hunters that attack in groups of up to a dozen individuals, ripping apart their prey with sharp talons and powerful jaws. They are lean and muscular, and have two powerful legs and a long tail that helps them maintain balance. Although deinonychuses don’t use their dexterous clawed forelimbs to attack, the dinosaurs can use them to pull aside small barriers. Although some of these dinosaurs have scaly skin, most have thatches of vibrantly colored feathers as well. A deinonychus is about 6 feet tall and weighs about 150 pounds.

 However, larger deinonychuses exist. These creatures—which stand taller than a human—are called megaraptors.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Dinosaur_Deinonychus.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Deinonychus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=118)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
<trait label="Dinosaur" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=45" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 97</row>

**Perception** +7; low-light vision, scent (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +9, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +3

**Con** +4

**Int** -4

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 19 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +5 

</row>

**HP** 30

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +9,
**Damage** 2d6+3 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
talon +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 1d6+3 slashing plus 1d4 bleed

**Darting Attack** <actions string="Single Action" />  The deinonychus Strides up to 10 feet and then makes a Strike, or makes a Strike and then Strides up to 10 feet.

**Predator's Advantage**   Bleeding creatures are flat-footed to the deinonychus.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-32" />
name: Deinonychus
